description: Try our easy to follow Caprese Salad with Hot Cross Bun Croutons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Caprese salad,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Tomato,Low sugar,Easter leftovers,Easter
name: Caprese Salad with Hot Cross Bun Croutons Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 170Â°C. Roughly tear hot cross bun into 2cm pieces and place in a bowl with half of the olive oil and a pinch of salt. Toss to combine.
Place hot cross bun pieces on a baking tray and bake for 5 minutes or until toasted and crunchy. Set aside.
Cut tomatoes into chunks and tear bocconcini into halves. Arrange in a serving bowl.
Drizzle over balsamic vinegar and remaining olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Scatter over basil and hot cross bun croutons to serve.
